pr_title: Add gradle dependency check task & upgrade dependencies

timeline.bodyText: This needs to be kept, unless we want to stop distribute it in core. We could start by changing it to runtimeOnly (or just remove it, but we should quick check that we are not breaking known add-ons).
timeline.author: thc202

replies.bodyText:
I guess we have to keep it for now, it seems used by:

ascanrules
ascanrulesBeta
fuzz
pscanrules
sse
websocket


commonlib is already on collections4
    implementation("org.apache.commons:commons-collections4:4.4")
replies.author: kingthorin

timeline.bodyText: We should not introduce it as api, it does not seem to be needed though.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.message:
Add gradle dependency check task & upgrade dependencies

- Similar to: https://github.com/zaproxy/zap-extensions/pull/2308
`./gradlew dependencyUpdates`, should appear under the "help" Gradle
Tasks grouping in Eclipse.
- Update most dependencies, with minor code tweaks to address moved or
deprecated classes/functionality.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
